title: Chanelle Hayes: Big Brother star shows off weight loss in Tenerife
text:
Advertisement

She lost an incredible three stone earlier this year after a dedicated regime of exercise and healthy eating.

And Chanelle Hayes showcased the fruits of her labour as she sported a red and leopard print bikini during a girly break to Tenerife, Spain on Friday.

The former Big Brother star, 31, looked happy and confident as she soaked up the sun while displaying her incredible figure.

Looking good: Chanelle Hayes showcased the fruits of her labour as she sported a red and leopard print bikini during a girly break to Tenerife, Spain on Friday

Chanelle has been very vocal about her weight loss journey, keeping her fans updated with her process over the months.

And her hard work certainly seems to be paying as she showcased her much slimmer physique while enjoying a day by the swimming pool of her hotel.

The TV personality flashed the flesh in a dark red halterneck bikini top with a leopard print trim, which she paired with matching high-waist bottoms.

Keeping her ensemble simple, Chanelle paired her swimwear with some white flip-flops, and added a sheer, black lace cover-up.

Beach babe: The former Big Brother star, 31, looked happy and confident as she soaked up the sun while displaying her incredible figure

Bikini figure: Chanelle has been very vocal about her weight loss journey, keeping her fans updated with her process over the months, after shedding an incredible three stone (pictured right in January 2019)

While her raven tresses cascaded down her back (of which she later swept into a messy bun), Chanelle allowed her natural beauty to shine through by ditching the make-up.

The mother-of-two was enjoying a break from mummy duties as she sipped on cocktails, before taking a refreshing dip in the swimming pool.

Keen to document their travels, she and her pal posed for some selfies, with Chanelle clearly keen to keep her fans up-to-date with her travels.

Slimmed down: And her hard work certainly seems to be paying as she showcased her much slimmer physique while enjoying a day by the swimming pool of her hotel

Gorgeous: The TV personality flashed the flesh in a dark red halterneck bikini top with a leopard print trim, which she paired with matching high-waist bottoms

Doing well: The star, who first shot to fame in 2007 as a feisty 19-year-old contestant on Big Brother, regularly posts Instagram updates documenting how she'd been doing as she continued her fitness regime

Fashionista: Keeping her ensemble simple, Chanelle paired her swimwear with some white flip-flops, and added a sheer, black lace cover-up

Confident: The former Big Brother beauty happily showcased her slender figure as she stripped off her cover up

The star, who first shot to fame in 2007 as a feisty 19-year-old contestant on Big Brother, regularly posts Instagram updates documenting how she'd been doing as she continued her fitness regime.

In April this year she shared a before and after snap of herself which showed off her much slimmer frame.

Accompanying the snap, the star wrote: 'It’s spurring me on to get to my goal!! From no waist to waist! From too tight sleeves to sleeves that fit! From leggings to jeans. From big calves to toned calves. From lethargic to energetic. From insecure to more confident.

'When I see my progress from all it does it spur me on to get to where I want to be. And I will. LET’S DO THIS.'

Meanwhile, Chanelle revealed in May that she had lost more than three stone and gone down to a size 12 for the first time in three years.

Lovely: While her raven tresses cascaded down her back (of which she later swept into a messy bun), Chanelle allowed her natural beauty to shine through by ditching the make-up

Hard work pays off: The star, who first shot to fame in 2007 as a feisty 19-year-old contestant on Big Brother, regularly posts Instagram updates documenting how she'd been doing as she continued her fitness regime

Catching some rays: The raven-haired beauty larked around on her phone while she and her friend soaked up the sun

Selfie Queens: The pair were keen to document their trip as they snapped photos on their phones

She happily shared a snap of herself in her skinny jeans, where she detailed how confident she felt after shedding enough weight to slip back into them.

She penned: 'THIS IS OFFICIALLY THE SMALLEST I HAVE BEEN SINCE SUMMER 2016!!

'So in November for my birthday I wore a size 18-20 jumpsuit and hated it, felt like [poo emoji]. I’ve put in a lot of effort and hard work and I can now fit into my size 12s.

Getting there: In April this year she shared a before and after snap of herself which showed off her much slimmer frame

Taking a dip: Chanelle later took a dip in the pool, before drying off with a navy blue towel

Work it: The mother-of-two confidently strutted around the pool after taking a refreshing dip

Strip down: The beauty pulled off her cover-up to reveal her slimmer frame underneath

'DON’T GET ME WRONG- these jeans are nice and stretchy lol. But my belt is on the smallest hole and could do with being a bit tighter, I have no overhang and I feel confident. I have lots of other 12s that still don’t fit yet, but the fact that these do is helping me keep going until I get where I want to be.'

Later that month she revealed yet another before and after photo of herself in a black jumpsuit, she said: 'November 2018 vs May 2019 Size 18-20 outfit vs size 12 outfit 15st 6lbs vs 11st 13lbs 84 RHR vs 54 RHR.'

Chanelle revealed that she had gained 'more confidence and happiness' since losing weight.

And though back in August she revealed that she had crept back up to size 14 after six weeks of bad eating while on holiday, Chanelle wowed to get back in track and it's clear that her hard work has paid off.

Taking a dip: The Yorkshire native had her hands full with essentials during her pool break

Staying safe: Chanelle covered her skin in sunscreen as she lay in the sun

Sunbathe: The beauty and her pal bagged prime spots by the pool

The star is mother to Blakely, nine, with footballer Matthew Bates, and two-year-old son Frankie, who turns two later this month, with ex boyfriend Ryan Oates, and she admits she battles staying in shape with motherhood.

Back in January, Chanelle broke down in tears as she discussed her yo-yoing weight on This Morning and spoke about the detrimental impact trolls have on her.

The star admitted other women such as Cheryl lost weight with heartbreak, but she goes the other way.

Time to swim: The Yorkshire lass looked ready for her swim

Holiday: The TV personality was clearly enjoying her getaway from drizzly England as she soaked up the sun in Spain

Hey there: Chanelle didn't appear to have a care in the world as she walked through her holiday resort

She said: 'I am trying really hard to diet, and it is hard, especially with two kids on my own and trying to earn a living...

'I've got the will power of a sloth I've really struggled, what's hurtful is when people say to me, I got a message saying you know you can be slim AND be a mum.

'They're still being said they could say it to anybody, sometimes it really does hit a nerve.'

Fame: She rose to fame on the 2007 series of Big Brother, she was just 19 (pictured in 2007)
